title: Pokemon live wallpaper is creapy when they turn ttheir heads 180 to 360 degrees around..
content: I love the pokemon live wallpaper but lately the pokemon keep turning there heads 180 and some times 360 degrees.   On evee it kinda looks like grooming but on some of the others its just creepy as heck..  esp on scorbunny.    can someone poke the devs and get an update.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
